EmailTemplate.subject: Turns Out We’ve Got the Winning Checkout Formula Just for TJX – Read On.
EmailTemplate.textOnly: We’ve developed the winning checkout formula – just for TJX. Every retailer is looking for that “secret sauce”; the balance between smart merchandising for upsells in the checkout area, while also maintaining manageable queues that don’t put off shoppers completely. What a balance to try to strike on a daily basis. 47% of shoppers will avoid stores or just walk out because of long lines. What a missed opportunity for TJX. What if we told you we have a data-driven solution for TJX – a personalized checkout area design that results in an increase in customer throughput and a decrease in cart abandonment? <[[https://www.ncr.com/retail/tjx-infographic?utm_source=Email&utm_medium=Other&utm_campaign=2022_Oct_TJXCampaign_Retail&utm_content=Email3&utm_industry=retail&utm_sub-industry=]]> So, what exactly is the winning checkout formula for TJX?
